name: Sleepy Cat (akschoenbauer)
description:
The evening is nigh, and this cat is exhausted after a long day of prowling the house, hiding from humans, and taking cat naps in the sun. All the cat wants is to go to bed and settle in for a good night's sleep. But alas! The cat can't find its bed! It seems that you will have to help the cat find its bed by navigating a series of mazes and challenges. You will have to be careful to pick up toys the cat needs to sleep and avoid terrifying hazards, such as tinfoil. Make sure to step wisely when you encounter the house dog as well. The goal is to get through all of the mazes and challenges to finally allow the cat to enter it's bed and get a good night's sleep!

Controls:

  • Select: Shift
  • Start: Option/Alt or Enter
  • Movement:
    • Up: Up arrow or W
    • Down: Down arrow or S
    • Left: Left arrow or A
    • Right: Right arrow or D
  • Interact w Characters: Option/Alt
  • Advance Text: Option/Alt

Enjoy the game!
